description: Dart source file defining Flutter widget classes for displaying transaction and budget cards in a finance tracking app frontend. Includes custom widgets TransactionListTile and BudgetCard with styling details.

classes.name: TransactionListTile
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying a transaction item with animated container, tap and delete callbacks.

classes.name: BudgetCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a budget overview with progress indicator and status color.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for TransactionListTile and BudgetCard.
